# StringSegment.IsIdenticalTo method

Determines whether this segment is identical to the specified segment.

```csharp
public bool IsIdenticalTo(StringSegment seg)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| seg | The other segment. |

## Return Value

`true` if the owner strings, offset, and length of this segment are exactly the same as the other segment.
